system.requirement: When you ask the great jaguar spirit to inhabit your body, roll +wits. On a strong hit, you transform into a full jaguar. @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} (1) and take +6 nuna. On a weak hit, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} (2) and take +4 nuna. The tranformation ends if a full day has passed; if you have 0 health, spirit, or nuna; or if you choose to end it.

abilities.description:
When you make a move relying on aspects of the new body, choose one.

  • Add +1 and suffer -1 nuna.
  • Roll +nuna and suffer -2 nuna.
As above, but you may tranform into a humanoid jaguar form.
As above, but you may tranform into a spectral version of either form. (You must take this upgrade last.)
